issue.title: Remove or update Windows installation tutorial

content.raw:
Build instructions for Windows are being fixed in [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo\_tutorials/pull-requests/555/updated-gazebo9-build-tutorial-on-windows](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/555/updated-gazebo9-build-tutorial-on-windows/diff) .

I’ve also noticed that the page [http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=install\_on\_windows](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=sensors&tut=install_on_windows&ver=9.0) doesn’t exist. Is that because somebody has already deleted it because it was outdated?
